questions.name: Assertion (A)     : Bangladesh imports jute from India. /  Reason    (R)      : Bangladesh has most of the jute mills. ?
questions.explanation: When Bangladesh was created after partition of India, the areas of jute production went to Bangladesh while the jute mills were left in India. So, India imports raw jute from Bangladesh.
